mentions.tacticalSituation: The race in Twickenham is between the Liberal Democrats and the Conservatives. Labour are strongly likely to finish in a distant third place.

leaflet.personalStatement: I wanted to write to you about the work I've done relating to Twickenham. Here's what the data is telling me â€“
leaflet.additionalNotes: Mike Smithson, the founder and editor of PoliticalBetting.com, outlines the tactical voting situation in Twickenham, advising Labour voters that lending their vote to the Liberal Democrats could stop the Conservatives from winning in Twickenham.
